hero.name: Kevin Lopez
hero.description: I create elegant solutions to complex problems through code.

items.title: Fleet Managment System
items.description: A full stack application to manage a fleet of vehicles. Includes real-time tracking, analytics, routes managment, beautiful, modern and immersive interface.

items.title: Dental Clinic Management System
items.description: A full stack application to manage a dental clinic. Includes patient management, appointments, treatments, billing, a visual and dynamic Teeth Chart. User authentication and authorization with OAuth 2.0.

items.title: Akinmueble - Real Estate Website
items.description: A full stack real estate website with microservices. Includes property listings, search, filters, contact, fully web business workflow and Email/SMS Notifications

technologies.title: Skills & Technologies
technologies.description: These are some of the technologies and tools I frequently use to build robust and modern solutions.

items.name: JavaScript
items.description: Essential programming language for frontend and backend web development.

items.name: TypeScript
items.description: A superset of JavaScript that adds static typing to improve code quality and maintainability.

items.name: Python
items.description: Versatile programming language known for its simplicity and readability, widely used in web development, data science, and automation.

items.name: Java
items.description: Object-oriented programming language used for building cross-platform applications, from web to mobile.

items.name: C/C++
items.description: General-purpose programming languages widely used in system development and high-performance applications.

items.name: Git
items.description: Distributed version control system for efficient source code management.

items.name: Docker
items.description: Tool for creating, deploying, and running applications in containers.

items.name: AWS
items.description: Cloud services platform that allows easy deployment and scaling of applications.

items.name: MongoDB
items.description: Document-oriented NoSQL database, perfect for flexible and scalable applications.

items.name: MySQL
items.description: Widely used relational database management system in enterprise applications.

items.name: PostgreSQL
items.description: Advanced open-source relational database known for its robustness and extensibility.

items.name: React
items.description: JavaScript library for building interactive and modern user interfaces.

items.name: Tailwind CSS
items.description: Utility-first CSS framework for quickly building modern and responsive interfaces.

items.name: Spring Boot
items.description: Java framework for building robust and productive backend applications.

items.name: Node.js
items.description: JavaScript runtime environment for the server, ideal for scalable applications.

items.name: LoopBack
items.description: Framework for building RESTful APIs with Node.js, facilitating backend service creation.

items.name: AngularJS
items.description: JavaScript framework for building dynamic web applications with a focus on single-page applications (SPAs).

items.name: CUDA
items.description: Parallel computing platform and API for using the GPU for general-purpose processing.
